185902081.review:
Before everything went super politically correct and the extreme, radical left hijacked all the entertainment mediums they could ([i]IE: Activists, Keyboard Culture Warriors, Social Media users and Sweet Baby Inc[/i]), we got absolute gems like this game.

You can hate me all you like for being honest, but I'm not American and I'm not in America, so it simply doesn't phase me that because of my views you'll try cancel culture me and call me a four letter M word supporter.

It's just fun, it's everything a game should be, It's everything a game [i]used[/i] to be, It doesn't preach at you, it doesn't shame you, it doesn't tell you how you have think, it doesn't tell you what it believes is right and wrong, the only message here is "I want to entertain you".

It's just a fun game.

It won't please everyone, it's not meant too, it sure as heck won't please the [i]modern audience[/i] who it's not for and wouldn't play it anyways.

There's no modern gender hangups, there's no self hating protagonist, there's no forced political stances and views, there's just a fun story that aims at it's target demographic, does it well, and in no way does it need to apologise for it.

This game makes me smile, but it also makes me kinda sad seeing what we got from video games after this, and knowing this just simply wouldn't be tolerated by any publisher in 2025 because it's not inclusive enough, it says naughty words, It's not a predominantly female cast, the cast who are in it aren't described with an alphanumeric acronym, there's no focus on racial traits, it's only aimed at people who like Metal and Rock (Note: that's not just guys no matter how much people swear it is), and it doesn't try at all to placate people it shouldn't.

Would love to see a sequel to this, though that won't happen, and I don't think it should given current climates, but I miss games like this, I miss having fun.

185623969.review: this needs a fuckin sequel most badass game

185525367.review:
In 2025 this is still a nice adventure game. Of course you need to be into this type of music (heavy metal). The references are great, as well as the voice acting - did they really get all these stars of heavy metal to voice in this game?! I think so! After 1 hour of game I heard Ozzy, Lemmy (and of course Jack Black). The gameplay is refreshing and plenty: driving a car, doing solos, differents types of combos, controlling 'troops', and much more!

The only 2 downsides of this game: the graphics are pretty old now, and the game wants you to do things its way sometime.

It is worth its price, but if you can get it on sale I'd say it's a must-have if you are a metalhead!

184633068.review:
Rovnou na začátek řeknu, že pokud máte rádi klasický metal, tak téhle hře určitě dejte šanci, protože nenajdete jinou, která dává metalu takovou poklonu.

Ale abysme se dostali k hodnocení samotného gameplaye, Brutal Legend je hra, která má charakter, ale i svoje mouchy. Neporazitelná je ve své stylizaci, unikátnosti a samozřejmě hudbě. Za zmínku stojí i komedické prvky dialogů. 

Combat je střídání mezi klasickým meele z pohledu třetí osoby a s real time strategií. Melee je funkční, ale možná trochu banální, i když nízkou komplexností stačí na relativně kratší hru. RTS je překvapivý element který jsem nečekal, že si užiju jakožto nefanda tohoto žánru, i když občas může být frustrující, a to hlavně na těžších obtížnostech. 

Tady se dostáváme k hlavní výtce co ke hře mám - často nevysvětluje dostatečně co po vás chce a jak mechaniky fungují. S tím bych normálně ani neměl tolik problém, ale Brutal Legend má několik věcí, které fungují relativně unikátně, a není tedy tolik jednoduché napoprvé odhadnout co po vás hra chce. Takže, nestyďte se pogooglit mechaniky ať jich můžete využít už od začátku a ne když náhodou přijdete na to jak že správně fungují.

Druhá mírně problematická věc je, že hodně kontextu k příběhu je vyprávěno skrze 13 collectibles umístěných na mapě - ale občas kampaň a její cutscény počítají s tím, že jsou vám známy informace řečené jenom v nich, takže pokud projedete okolo a lore point ignorujete, může váš několikrát trochu zmást proč se co děje.

Jako poznámku bokem, záhlédl jsem několik negativních hodnocení vůči ovládání auta, ale tady naopak musím říct, že je to jedno z nejlepších ovládání mimo závodní hry co jsem kde viděl, v rámci toho, že se mi s autem nikdy nepodařilo se někde zaseknout či převrátit do nepoužitelné situace - auto má fakt nádherně naprogramovanou fyziku do open world terénu s nástrahami. Jo, ta motorka, to je otřes a dělá to jeden level skoro nehratelným, ale to je jiná věc.

Brutal Legend je sice něco co už pomalu spadá spíše do kategorie "jank", ale používám tenhle termín s pozitivním nábojem. Určitě je to více zapamatovatelný zážitek než další dezinfikovaná trendy-následující AAA hra.

184386956.review:
A temática, a arte do seu mundo, as referencias, tudo isso é bem legal, principalmente pra quem é próximo de rock/metal, vai curtir muitos detalhes. O obstaculo que tive, foi que a gameplay pra mim em mais de um momento foi bem maçante e em alguns momentos que exigem um mínimo de precisão não te entregam condições pra isso, em especial as missões estilo RTS. Pra quem se importa muito com fluidez de gameplay, pode ser até que desista de terminar o jogo por isso, mas vale lembrar que é um jogo de 2009.

184220236.review:
Brutal Legend:  Jack Black's personal masturbatory material.

Overall, not a good game by any metric.  I put in an hour (I'm really not sure where the other 6.4 came from unless one of my family members installed it and *also* could not manage to finish it due to pure suck value) and I can't put up with this crap anymore.

I decided to come back and play this one that has been sitting in my game library for several years mostly because I wanted it to be good.  It was not.  It is an abortion of what could have been.  There is so much potential for something truly excellent, but it really just feels like a dumbed down version of other map exploration with a theme games.  Play Mad Max with a heavy metal playlist going in the background and you've got a better metal game than this dumpster fire. 

If you're one of those guys who still watch Jack Black make a fool out of himself in public, usually by talking about politics he doesn't understand, or one of those guys who still play "this is a tribute" like its actually metal... well, this is the game for you and you will probably be able to ignore the poor design choices over the fact that OMG JACK BLACK.
